info.title: Standardized Error Schema
info.description: A reusable schema to standardize error responses with HTTP status codes, error types, reasons, domains, metadata, and error details.

reason.description: The specific reason for the error, in UPPER_SNAKE_CASE format

url.description: The URL or endpoint path associated with the error, typically representing the service or resource domain that generated the error. This could include the base URL (e.g., 'https://api.example.com') or a specific endpoint path (e.g., '/v1/users/{userId}/update') that caused the error. This helps identify the specific API or service responsible for the error, aiding in troubleshooting and support.

metadata.description: Additional metadata providing context for the error

details.description: Details that provide more information about the error

message.description: A detailed message explaining the error

additionalInfo.description: Additional information about the error, if applicable

errorType.description: Fixed error type for unauthenticated requests
